plot outline: A carefree youngster grows up facing severe criticism regarding his lack of academic ability. When he wishes to get married, he is faced with many rejections on the basis of his lack of suitability. How will he face the challenges in his life?
title: A Happy Married Life
plot: A carefree youngster grows up facing severe criticism regarding his lack of academic ability. When he wishes to get married, he is faced with many rejections on the basis of his lack of suitability. How will he face the challenges in his life?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
